fulltext:
PHP DEVELOPER 
1) PROFILE INFORMATION 
● Full name: Đồng Văn Lưu 
● Gender: Male 
● Birthday: 07/09/1990 
● Education: Bachelor of Information technology of University of 
Science HCMC 
● Address: Vĩnh Lộc A ward, Bình Chánh district , Hồ Chí Minh city 
2) WORKING PROCESS 
02/2013 - 10/2014 
VTM Viet Nam J.S.C 
PHP Developer 
● Take part in the first project named IJNET 
○ Team: 7 Developers, 2 Testers, 1 Leader 
○ My role: Developer as Intership 
○ Technology: PHP / Symfony 2 
○ My tasks: 
■ Master screens: Aggregate (insert, update, delete, search) 
■ Transaction screens: Depot (javascript process) 
● Coding the small PHP project that it interact with MySQL database and user (insert, 
update, delete, search) 
● Modify and add small functions for the application web that it itinesary supervision via 
GPS technology (css, javascript process) 
● Coding the HTML of small project that it buy cards online on mobile phone (javascript 
process with jquerymobile) 
● Take part in a project named TMS 
○ Team: 3 Developers, 2 Testers, 1 Leader 
○ My role: Developer 
○ Technology: PHP / CakePHP 2 
○ My tasks: 
■ Master screens: Route, Preset, Group, Set (insert, update, delete, 
search, import/export excel) 
■ Transaction screens: Route Assignment (javascript process) 
Experiences: 
- HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Javascript, Jquery 
- PHP, Symfony, CakePHP 
- MySQL 
- Linux OS 
- Redmine, SVN 
-  
01/2015 - 02/2016 
Asian Dragon Co., Ltd 
PHP Developer 
● Fix bug and upgrade (edit, add report screens) the adagps.com website (Supervision: 
location, fuel, camera, temperature of vehicles) 
Experiences: TBS, XAJAX, Google maps API, MySQL database 
06/2017 - Hiện tại 
Ligust & Co Co., Ltd 
PHP Developer

● Develop mobile phone shop website (Codeigniter) 
● Batboduphattai.com: develop lease service website of canvas and umbrella

● Maintain, fix bug and update websites: (Wordpress) 
○ Beneflex.me 
○ Iconic-intl.com 
○ Jawhm.or.jp 
Experiences: Zend, Codeigniter, Wordpress, Sass, Git
